abstract: Family is the basic unit of society. They are the ones who we always look up to. Many people see their family as motivation, inspiration, and blessing to keep on going. While there are some people don't want their family because of family problems. Love from a family is the best gift every person will receive because it is God greatest give and a show his love for us. Every person deserves to be happy and be loved by the help of each family.
meta: Project: The importance of family to people
